Pet Manager Lemper:
Hmm... Recently I heard a rumor that some group is collecting large numbers of Drake and Wyrm eggs. Tsk! There's only one thing that I can think of: somebody is trying to create a calvalry unit composed of Striders!
Listen to instructions about how to raise a pet.
Purchase pet items.
Exchange pet equipment for higher-grade one.
Exchange the hatchling equipment with the strider equipment.
Evolve pet.
Exchange the pet trade ticket with a pet.
Sell your items.
See the lord and get the tax rate information.
